project.name: xyz-jphil-persistent_storage-pfs
project.description: xyz-jphil-persistent_storage-pfs (PFs - Pesistent Files) A library to use simple files to store persistent data. Goals : (*) Should work on all platforms - desktop-app, mobile-app, web-app, front-end-webapp, on top of a database (*) Should be easily replacable when user wants to switch over to a real database (*) Should stay lean (*) Might become complex and ugly loosing it's charm
